attributes.review: Don’t do it. Doesn’t function properly. Viruses spread like crazy. Zero hope for this app. Should be banned completely for all the destruction is causes. If I could give it negative stars I would.
attributes.title: Nope

attributes.review: Pleas whatever YOU do don’t and I repeat DON’T download this app. I downloaded it because I wanted to support my favorite Cheeto flavor, but when I did it hacked my Snapchat and leaked my nudes. Now everyone knows about my third butthole. Thanks a lot Trump.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS

attributes.review: never in my life have I seen such a slow, useless, and poorly laid out app. I don’t think they spent more than an hour on it max. If I could give zero stars I would !!
attributes.title: SLOW

attributes.review: Extremely invasive first question it asked me was my phone number :() like I don’t know them like that this is probably run by the Chinese as spyware
attributes.title: Will never use again

attributes.review: Downloaded this app to support my favorite bunker boii, and it just wrecked my phone.😪 after downloading for an hour the app was just full of hypocritical🥰 racist💋homophobic🧚 transphobic✨And sexist🌼 remarks. Oh well turns out that’s all that our president says anyway🤷‍♀️😘
attributes.title: BOOMERS BEWARE

attributes.review: i hate this app so much. it makes me feel sick kinda like i have that stupid corona myth. thank god it doesn't force me to wear a mask OR ELSE. its such a stupid rule it isn't even a law. anyways chile DO NOT DOWNLOAD absolutely horrible and waste of money and time
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: The app wouldn’t work when I tried opening it, at one point it did work but it had way too many ads and slowed my phone down.
attributes.title: Garbage

attributes.review: I downloaded app and may I say how bad it is. It has cause my phone to slow down. The app always lags and it’s was terribly made. I wish there was a worse rating to give!
attributes.title: Terribleeee

attributes.review: i hate this app so much it’s slow and full of bugs and takes forever to install. confusing to work with and just overall bad.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!

attributes.review: The app straight up took way too long to download, was glitchy, and overall a horrible example of what American is capable of.
attributes.title: Wasted time I can never get back
